ernie_vs_mapped.summary_report:
STATISTICAL ANALYSIS REPORT
==================================================

Analysis Type: Comparison
Target: Right_Hippocampus
Optimization: max
Comparison: ernie vs mapped

Study Design: Within-subjects comparison
Variables Analyzed: ROI_Mean, ROI_Max, ROI_Focality

RESULTS:
------------------------------
ROI_MEAN: lower in condition B (-0.000 = -0.1% = -0.01 SD)
  p = 0.972, Cohen's d = -0.01 - Not significant

ROI_MAX: higher in condition B (0.005 = +1.2% = +0.06 SD)
  p = 0.815, Cohen's d = 0.04 - Not significant

ROI_FOCALITY: lower in condition B (-0.100 = -7.1% = -0.62 SD)
  p = 0.019, Cohen's d = -0.40 - **SIGNIFICANT**

==================================================
